objects.text:
• Adjustable Height & Tilt Control
• Premium Puresoft PU Upholstery
• Ergonomic Padded Armrests

product_details.description: Product Description          Amazon Basics Classic Puresoft PU-Padded Mid-Back Office Computer Desk Chair with Armrest - Cream             From the Manufacturer          Amazon Basics VERSATILE USE: Office desk chair for home office, work station, or conference room ADJUSTABLE COMFORT: Adjustable seat height, adjustable seat angle, and tilt control for customizable comfort STURDY CONSTRUCTION:Supports up to 275 pounds; sturdy KD metal base COMFORTABLE DESIGN:Puresoft PU upholstery in Black; contoured padded seat, backrest, and armrests for comfort; durable caster wheels for smooth-rolling mobility EASY ASSEMBLY:Assembly instructions included; components (casters, base, arms, seat mechanism, hardware kit) arrive packed in the back cushion PRODUCT SPECIFICATIONS: Product Dimensions: 23.75 x 26 x 38.25 - 42 inches (WxDxH); seat width: 19.5 inches; seat depth: 17.75 inches; arm height: 26.25 - 30 inches Brand - Amazon Basics ** Color - Cream ** Product Dimensions - 26"D x 23.75"W x 42"H ** Size - 26"D x 23.75"W x 42"H ** Back Style - Mid Back **

banner_details:
The banner features a clean and modern layout divided into two vertical sections. The left half has a dark gradient background containing all the textual and graphic contents, while the right half shows the product prominently—an ergonomic office chair on a soft grey gradient background with circular accent graphics. The "heading" ID text at the top emphasizes the product type with bold white typography, followed by the "subheading" in a smaller yellow-orange font. Below this, the "description" ID provides a brief feature list. Pricing is highlighted boldly in yellow-orange via the "price" ID. A yellow-orange rectangular "cta_button" contains a dark-blue label "cta" inviting immediate action.

**Color Palette:**
- Midnight Blue: #2C3E50
- Slate Gray: #4A5568
- Light Gray: #F0F0F0, #E2E2E2
- Warm Yellow-Orange: #F5B041
- White: #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image features an office chair with a refined and minimalist color palette. The dominant color is a soft ivory white (#F3F1EC) on the cushioned seat and backrest, giving the chair a clean, elegant look. The armrests and base are a matte black (#2B2B2B), offering contrast and structural definition. Subtle highlights and shadows are formed where the ivory upholstery meets the curved contours, enhancing its plush appearance and shape. The black elements seamlessly blend with the frame, while the muted ivory remains highlighted amid this contrast. A sophisticated palette can include Ivory (#F3F1EC), Charcoal Black (#2B2B2B), Soft Gray (#D8D6D0), and Steel (#4B4B4B).
